title: Monitor issues
body:
After champ select my screen turns black and shows this error message since patch 7.1
D-Sub
Out of range
194.4khz/200hz
I tried repairing the client uninstalling/installing changing my resolution but no such luck
Suggestions?please help im starved

replies.body: You may be able to workaround this issue by pressing Alt+Enter to toggle your fullscreen.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you individually to see why you're having that problem.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
